title: Night Sky
description: Final project for General Assembly's part-time front-end development course, completed in April 2016.

title: Triangles
description: WDI Project Zero at General Assembly (September 2016). Interactive triangles using p5.js.

title: Airbnb
description: WDI Project One at General Assembly (October 2016). A clone of Airbnb built using Ruby on Rails.

title: Wealth Redistribution Simulator
description: WDI [Group] Project Two at General Assembly (November 2016). Built using Ruby on Rails & Phaser.

title: Covered
description: Mentor matching platform built for the Techfugees Hackathon 2016, which won 2nd prize. Built using Ruby on Rails.

title: Business As Usual
description: Final Project for General Assembly's Sofware Engineering Immersive, completed in November 2016. 3D visual representation of climate data Built using Ruby on Rails, leaflet.js & three.js

title: Jaxsta
description: A massive database of official music credits. Released in Beta in 2019. I worked at Jaxsta from 2016-2021, working across the Front-End and Database teams to deliver the Jaxsta product.
